discover_actual_search_queries.current_problem: We're guessing what people search for
discover_actual_search_queries.gsc_solution: See exact queries: "wedding limo saskatoon", "party bus regina price"
discover_actual_search_queries.business_impact: Create content for queries that actually bring customers
discover_actual_search_queries.example: Discover people search "how much party bus cost" more than "party bus pricing"

identify_ranking_opportunities.current_problem: Don't know which keywords we almost rank for
identify_ranking_opportunities.gsc_solution: See keywords ranking #11-20 (page 2) with optimization potential
identify_ranking_opportunities.business_impact: Move from page 2 to page 1 = massive traffic increase
identify_ranking_opportunities.example: Find "airport limo saskatoon" ranks #14, optimize to reach top 10

measure_seo_strategy_success.current_problem: Can't measure if our SEO efforts are working
measure_seo_strategy_success.gsc_solution: Track ranking improvements, traffic growth, click-through rates
measure_seo_strategy_success.business_impact: Prove ROI of SEO investment, identify what works
measure_seo_strategy_success.example: See FAQ page optimization increased clicks by 150%

fix_technical_seo_problems.current_problem: Hidden technical issues may be hurting rankings
fix_technical_seo_problems.gsc_solution: Alert for crawl errors, mobile issues, page speed problems
fix_technical_seo_problems.business_impact: Fix issues blocking Google from ranking your site
fix_technical_seo_problems.example: Discover Google can't crawl vehicle gallery page

optimize_existing_content.current_problem: Don't know which pages have ranking potential
optimize_existing_content.gsc_solution: See which pages get impressions but low clicks
optimize_existing_content.business_impact: Improve existing content instead of creating new
optimize_existing_content.example: Wedding transportation page gets impressions but low CTR - optimize title/description

local_search_optimization.current_problem: Don't know how we rank for "near me" searches
local_search_optimization.gsc_solution: Track local search performance and geographic data
local_search_optimization.business_impact: Optimize for Saskatchewan local search dominance
local_search_optimization.example: See "limo service near me" searches from Saskatoon vs Regina

seasonal_trend_analysis.current_problem: Don't know when people search for different services
seasonal_trend_analysis.gsc_solution: See search volume trends: prom season, wedding season, holidays
seasonal_trend_analysis.business_impact: Plan content and marketing campaigns around peak search times
seasonal_trend_analysis.example: Discover prom searches spike March-May, wedding searches April-September

voice_search_insights.current_problem: Don't know how voice search affects our business
voice_search_insights.gsc_solution: See longer, conversational search queries from voice search
voice_search_insights.business_impact: Optimize for "Hey Google" and Alexa searches
voice_search_insights.example: Find people ask "what's the best party bus rental in saskatoon"

step_1_verify_property.title: Verify Your Website Property
actions: Go to https://search.google.com/search-console/
Click "Add Property" and enter https://arrowlimousine.ca
Choose verification method (HTML file upload or DNS record)
Complete verification to gain access

step_2_submit_sitemap.title: Submit Your Website Sitemap
actions: In GSC, go to "Sitemaps" in left menu
Submit your sitemap URL: https://arrowlimousine.ca/sitemap.xml
Wait for Google to process (can take days/weeks)
Monitor indexing status and coverage

step_3_enable_data_collection.title: Wait for Data Collection (Critical!)
actions: GSC needs 3-4 days minimum to collect meaningful data
Historical data goes back 16 months maximum
Check back weekly to review performance trends
Data updates with 2-3 day delay

step_4_analyze_search_queries.title: Analyze Real Search Query Data
actions: Go to "Performance" → "Search Results"
Review "Queries" tab for actual search terms
Sort by impressions to see high-volume keywords
Identify low CTR opportunities for optimization

step_5_monitor_technical_health.title: Monitor Technical SEO Health
actions: Check "Coverage" for indexing issues
Review "Mobile Usability" for mobile problems
Monitor "Core Web Vitals" for page speed
Set up email alerts for critical issues

metrics_to_track: Queries with high impressions, low CTR (optimization opportunities)
action_items: Create content for high-impression, low-ranking queries
Optimize titles/descriptions for low CTR queries
Replicate success patterns from top pages
Improve page speed for poor-performing pages

keyword_opportunity_identification: High-impression keywords with room for CTR improvement
Competitor keyword gaps based on search landscape
Seasonal keyword trends for content planning
content_optimization_priorities: Pages with highest optimization potential (high impressions, low clicks)
Underperforming content that needs refresh or expansion
New content opportunities based on query analysis

optimization_opportunities: Move "limousine service saskatchewan" from position 12.5 to top 10
Create dedicated content for "airport limo service" (position 18.3)

optimization_priorities: Homepage has low CTR (2.8%) despite high impressions - optimize title/description
Airport limousine page has good CTR but low impressions - needs more content
Wedding transportation performing well - replicate success pattern

mobile_usability: Contact form has touch element spacing issues
core_web_vitals: Homepage LCP (Largest Contentful Paint) too slow: 3.2 seconds
Party bus page has layout shift issues

seasonal_trends.corporate_events: Year-round with peaks in October and March

actions: Set up Google Search Console for arrowlimousine.ca
Verify property ownership via HTML file or DNS
Submit sitemap.xml to GSC
Enable email notifications for critical issues
Wait for initial data collection (minimum 3-7 days)
Monitor data quality and coverage
Begin weekly performance reviews
Document baseline metrics
Implement weekly GSC analysis routine
Optimize pages with high impressions, low CTR
Create content for high-volume, low-ranking queries
Fix technical issues identified in GSC
Integrate GSC data with overall SEO strategy
Use query data to inform content calendar
Track ROI of SEO optimizations
Develop competitor analysis based on search landscape

summary.critical_value: GSC provides real search data vs guessing
summary.immediate_benefits: Fix technical issues, optimize existing content
